name: kth-chronogram
description: Chrome extension prototype for an interface on kth.se

scripts.build:css: postcss index.css -u postcss-import -u postcss-custom-media | csso -o dist/index.css
scripts.build:js: browserify index.js -t yo-yoify -t envify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -g unassertify -g uglifyify | uglifyjs -o dist/index.js -b beautify=false,ascii-only=true
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.watch: postcss index.css -w -u postcss-import -u postcss-custom-media -o dist/index.css & watchify index.js -d -t envify -o dist/index.js
